{{ item.title }} {{ isAccordionOpen(i) ? 'keyboard_arrow_up' : 'keyboard_arrow_down' }}
{{ item.content }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-filter', templateUrl: './filter.component.html', styleUrls: ['./filter.component.css'] }) export class FilterComponent { // data:any=[ {Languages:['English','Telugu','Tamil','Marati','Malayalam','kanada','punajabi','gujarati','bengali']; // Genere:['action','animation','biography','comedy','crime'] }] // keysOfUsersArray(){ // return Object.keys(this. data[0]) //return type Array // } accordionItems = [ { Languages:['English','Telugu','Tamil','Marati','Malayalam','kanada','punajabi','gujarati','bengali'], content: 'Content 1' }, ]; openAccordionIndex = -1; toggleAccordion(index: number) { if (this.isAccordionOpen(index)) { this.openAccordionIndex = -1; } else { this.openAccordionIndex = index; } } isAccordionOpen(index: number): boolean { return this.openAccordionIndex === index; } }
